V.label: Output DCO File
V.tip: Specifies name for the output dco file for the task

V.label: Create Batch Directory
V.tip: Specifies to assume batch creation mode and create batch directory

V.label: Create Document
V.tip: Create pages within a document

V.label: Done Page Status(es)
V.tip: Cooma-separated list of Done statuses, used to determine next problem page, and when to release a batch

V.label: Ignored Page Status(es)
V.tip: Comma-separated list of Ignored statuses, used to skip Attachment pages from processing

V.label: Validation Statuses
V.tip: Comma-separated list of Done,Override,Fail statuses assigned after validation, according to results

P.tip: Settings that enable RRS rules execution
P.title: Rulerunner Service

V.label: Main Task Profile
V.tip: Main task profile to run on Submit

V.label: Alternative Task Profile(s)
V.tip: Alternative task profile setting creates extra buttons for special data handling cases

P.tip: RRS log settings for the task
P.title: RRS Log Settings

V.label: Service Log
V.tip: Enable RRS service logging

V.label: Batch Log
V.tip: Produce RRS log in batch folder

V.label: Action Log Level
V.tip: Severity level for RRS logging from action execution

V.label: Flush Buffer
V.tip: Flushes file buffer after each write operation - degrades performance

V.label: RRS Type
V.tip: Switch between LocalRRS and HttpWRRS execution

V.label: WRRS URL
V.tip: Specify HTTP URL path for WRRS execution

G.title: Bind DCO Type to Panel
G.tip: Key-Value pairs to associate DCO Type to Panel class

V.tip: Assocciation of DCO Type to Dll.Panel (.cs) class name

V.label: Show Start Batch Panel
V.tip: Enables start batch panel with data validations

V.label: Enable Hold status
V.tip: When checked allow batch to be put on Hold

G.title: Document Statuses for Fixup
G.tip: Key-Value pairs to associate numeric document statuses to meaningful status name

G.title: Page Statuses for Fixup
G.tip: Key-Value pairs to associate numeric document statuses to meaningful status name

G.title: Suffixes of filetypes to manage
G.tip: Filetypes to be deleted or moved together with image file

V.label: What to display in the tree node labels for pages
V.tip: PageType or Sequence

V.label: Enforce Batch Structure
V.tip: Force batch to have correct structure before advancing

V.label: Delete image files
V.tip: Delete button removes image files completely(mark deleted if unchecked)

V.label: Expand all documents in tree
V.tip: Always expand the full batch tree

V.label: Allow pages to move between documents
V.tip: Allow moving a page across documents

V.label: Display Fingerprint Class
V.tip: Display the Fingerprint Class dropdown control

V.label: Barcode value for document separation
V.tip: >Barcode value that marks a new document

V.label: Scanner settings file for this task
V.tip: >File path containing scanner settings to load when task starts, if any

P.tip: Settings that determine page navigation, field display
P.title: Navigation/Display

V.label: Done Field Status(es)
V.tip: Cooma-separated list of Done field statuses, used to determine next field in Alt+L (next problem) order, or when Problems Only checkbox is ON - to hide such fields

V.label: Ignored Field Status(es)
V.tip: Comma-separated list of statuses of fields such as anchors or other fields that should never show up for indexing/verify

P.tip: Background field colors, as web literal colors (blue, magenta, etc.)
P.title: Background Field Colors

V.label: Low Conf Fields
V.tip: Background to distinguish fields recognized with low confidence

V.label: Invalid Fields
V.tip: Background to distinguish fields that failed validation

V.label: Normal Fields
V.tip: Background for norml fields

V.label: Header Format
V.tip: Define log header format

V.label: Line Format
V.tip: Define line format for logging data changes made by operator

V.label: Overlay Types
V.tip: Comma-separated list of page types for which to apply overlay on full image view

V.label: Background Images
V.tip: Comma-separated list of filenames that represents drop-out background to overlay with
